card.name: Accelerated Mutation
card.property: Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the highest converted mana cost among permanents you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its food just got a lot smaller and its stomach a lot bigger.

card.name: Ageless Sentinels
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Flying When Ageless Sentinels blocks, it becomes a Bird Giant, and it loses defender. (It's no longer a Wall. This effect lasts indefinitely.)

card.name: Alpha Status
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 for each other creature on the battlefield that shares a creature type with it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The best leaders are made by their followers.

card.name: Ambush Commander
card.property: Forests you control are 1/1 green Elf creatures that are still lands. {1}{G}, Sacrifice an Elf: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

card.name: Ancient Ooze
card.property: Ancient Ooze's power and toughness are each equal to the total converted mana cost of other creatures you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The ooze has always been. The ooze will always be.

card.name: Aphetto Runecaster
card.property: Whenever a permanent is turned face up, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The ignorant fear change; the wise use it as a weapon."

card.name: Ark of Blight
card.property: {3}, {T}, Sacrifice Ark of Blight: Destroy target land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When opened, it erases entire landscapes from minds and maps.

card.name: Astral Steel
card.property: Target creature gets +1/+2 until end of turn. Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn. You may choose new targets for the copies.)

card.name: Aven Farseer
card.property: Flying Whenever a permanent is turned face up, put a +1/+1 counter on Aven Farseer.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His enemies' trickery and deceit only fuel his righteous anger.

card.name: Aven Liberator
card.property: Flying Morph {3}{W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.) When Aven Liberator is turned face up, target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.

card.name: Bladewing the Risen
card.property: Flying When Bladewing the Risen enters the battlefield, you may return target Dragon permanent card from your graveyard to the battlefield. {B}{R}: Dragon creatures get +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Bladewing's Thrall
card.property: Bladewing's Thrall has flying as long as you control a Dragon. When a Dragon enters the battlefield, you may return Bladewing's Thrall from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Bonethorn Valesk
card.property: Whenever a permanent is turned face up, Bonethorn Valesk deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Barbarians weave its spurs into ceremonial charms to proclaim their hardiness in battle.

card.name: Brain Freeze
card.property: Target player puts the top three cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard. Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn. You may choose new targets for the copies.)

card.name: Break Asunder
card.property: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Cabal Conditioning
card.property: Any number of target players each discard a number of cards equal to the highest converted mana cost among permanents you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Hear only the Cabal's voice.See only the Cabal's way.Speak only the Cabal's word."—Cabal mantra

card.name: Cabal Interrogator
card.property: {X} {B}, {T}: Target player reveals X cards from his or her hand and you choose one of them. That player discards that card. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

card.name: Call to the Grave
card.property: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player sacrifices a non-Zombie creature. At the beginning of the end step, if no creatures are on the battlefield, sacrifice Call to the Grave.

card.name: Carbonize
card.property: Carbonize deals 3 damage to target creature or player. That creature can't be regenerated this turn. If the creature would die this turn, exile it instead.

card.name: Carrion Feeder
card.property: Carrion Feeder can't block. Sacrifice a creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Carrion Feeder.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Stinking of rot, it leaps between gravestones in search of its next meal.

card.name: Chartooth Cougar
card.property: {R}: Chartooth Cougar gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Mountaincycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Mountain card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.)

card.name: Chill Haunting
card.property: As an additional cost to cast Chill Haunting, exile X creature cards from your graveyard. Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn.

card.name: Claws of Wirewood
card.property: Claws of Wirewood deals 3 damage to each creature with flying and each player. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They say the forest has eyes. They never mention its claws.

card.name: Clutch of Undeath
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 as long as it's a Zombie. Otherwise, it gets -3/-3.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The hand of death recognizes its own.

card.name: Coast Watcher
card.property: Flying, protection from green

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The aven came to fear the forest's clawing branches, but the watchers quickly renewed their courage.

card.name: Consumptive Goo

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Silent as fog and relentless as plague, it is wet, creeping death.

card.name: Daru Spiritualist
card.property: Whenever a Cleric creature you control becomes the target of a spell or ability, it gets +0/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He lifts the spirits of his people so they may descend in wrath upon their foes.

card.name: Daru Warchief
card.property: Soldier spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. Soldier creatures you control get +1/+2.

card.name: Dawn Elemental
card.property: Flying Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Dawn Elemental.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It was midnight on the Daru Plains, yet it seemed the sun was rising.

card.name: Day of the Dragons
card.property: When Day of the Dragons enters the battlefield, exile all creatures you control. Then create that many 5/5 red Dragon creature tokens with flying. When Day of the Dragons leaves the battlefield, sacrifice all Dragons you control. Then return the exiled cards to the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Death's-Head Buzzard
card.property: Flying When Death's-Head Buzzard dies, all creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Infested with vermin, ever hungering, dropping from night's sky.

card.name: Decree of Annihilation
card.property: Exile all artifacts, creatures, and lands from the battlefield, all cards from all graveyards, and all cards from all hands. Cycling {5}{R}{R} ({5}{R}{R}, Discard this card: Draw a card.) When you cycle Decree of Annihilation, destroy all lands.

card.name: Decree of Justice
card.property: Create X 4/4 white Angel creature tokens with flying. Cycling {2}{W} ({2}{W}, Discard this card: Draw a card.) When you cycle Decree of Justice, you may pay {X}. If you do, create X 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.

card.name: Decree of Pain
card.property: Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated. Draw a card for each creature destroyed this way. Cycling {3}{B}{B} ({3}{B}{B}, Discard this card: Draw a card.) When you cycle Decree of Pain, all creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn.

card.name: Decree of Savagery
card.property: Put four +1/+1 counters on each creature you control. Cycling {4}{G}{G} ({4}{G}{G}, Discard this card: Draw a card.) When you cycle Decree of Savagery, you may put four +1/+1 counters on target creature.

card.name: Decree of Silence
card.property: Whenever an opponent casts a spell, counter that spell and put a depletion counter on Decree of Silence. If there are three or more depletion counters on Decree of Silence, sacrifice it. Cycling {4}{U}{U} ({4}{U}{U}, Discard this card: Draw a card.) When you cycle Decree of Silence, you may counter target spell.

card.name: Dimensional Breach
card.property: Exile all permanents. For as long as any of those cards remain exiled, at the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player returns one of the exiled cards he or she owns to the battlefield.

card.name: Dispersal Shield
card.property: Counter target spell if its converted mana cost is less than or equal to the highest converted mana cost among permanents you control.

card.name: Divergent Growth
card.property: Until end of turn, lands you control gain "{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nature has forgotten its own rules.

card.name: Dragon Breath
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has haste. {R}: Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn. When a creature with converted mana cost 6 or greater enters the battlefield, you may return Dragon Breath from your graveyard to the battlefield attached to that creature.

card.name: Dragon Fangs
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has trample. When a creature with converted mana cost 6 or greater enters the battlefield, you may return Dragon Fangs from your graveyard to the battlefield attached to that creature.

card.name: Dragon Mage
card.property: Flying Whenever Dragon Mage deals combat damage to a player, each player discards his or her hand, then draws seven cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You'll bend to my will—with or without your precious sanity."

card.name: Dragon Scales
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+2 and has vigilance. When a creature with converted mana cost 6 or greater enters the battlefield, you may return Dragon Scales from your graveyard to the battlefield attached to that creature.

card.name: Dragon Shadow
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 and has fear. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.) When a creature with converted mana cost 6 or greater enters the battlefield, you may return Dragon Shadow from your graveyard to the battlefield attached to that creature.

card.name: Dragon Tyrant
card.property: Flying, trample Double strike (This creature deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.) At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Dragon Tyrant unless you pay {R}{R}{R}{R}. {R}: Dragon Tyrant gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Dragon Wings
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has flying. Cycling {1}{U} ({1}{U}, Discard this card: Draw a card.) When a creature with converted mana cost 6 or greater enters the battlefield, you may return Dragon Wings from your graveyard to the battlefield attached to that creature.

card.name: Dragonspeaker Shaman
card.property: Dragon spells you cast cost {2} less to cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We speak the dragons' language of flame and rage. They speak our language of fury and honor. Together we shall weave a tale of destruction without equal."

card.name: Dragonstalker
card.property: Flying, protection from Dragons

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When the skies are filled with flames, the brave shall step forward to quench them."—Order prophecy

card.name: Dragonstorm
card.property: Search your library for a Dragon permanent card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library. Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn.)

card.name: Edgewalker
card.property: Cleric spells you cast cost {W}{B} less to cast. This effect reduces only the amount of colored mana you pay. (For example, if you cast a Cleric spell with mana cost {1}{W}, it costs {1} to cast.)

card.name: Elvish Aberration
card.property: {T}: Add {G}{G}{G} to your mana pool. Forestcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Forest card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.)

card.name: Enrage
card.property: Target creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You wouldn't like me when I'm angry."

card.name: Eternal Dragon
card.property: Flying {3}{W}{W}: Return Eternal Dragon from your graveyard to your hand. Activate this ability only during your upkeep. Plainscycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Plains card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.)

card.name: Exiled Doomsayer
card.property: All morph costs cost {2} more. (This doesn't affect the cost to cast creature spells face down.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He's desperate to hold back the future because he has seen it.

card.name: Extra Arms
card.property: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature attacks, it deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Perhaps extra heads would have served them better."—Foothill guide

card.name: Faces of the Past
card.property: Whenever a creature dies, tap all untapped creatures that share a creature type with it or untap all tapped creatures that share a creature type with it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The ties that bind can also strangle.

card.name: Fatal Mutation
card.property: Enchant creature When enchanted creature is turned face up, destroy it. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You wear that shell as a mask. Now it's your coffin."—Cabal cleric

card.name: Fierce Empath
card.property: When Fierce Empath enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a creature card with converted mana cost 6 or greater, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Final Punishment
card.property: Target player loses life equal to the damage already dealt to him or her this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The pain of a lifetime—every scrape, illness, and bruise—condensed into a single moment.

card.name: Force Bubble
card.property: If damage would be dealt to you, put that many depletion counters on Force Bubble instead. When there are four or more depletion counters on Force Bubble, sacrifice it. At the beginning of each end step, remove all depletion counters from Force Bubble.

card.name: Forgotten Ancient
card.property: Whenever a player casts a spell, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Forgotten Ancient. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may move any number of +1/+1 counters from Forgotten Ancient onto other creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its blood is life. Its body is growth.

card.name: Form of the Dragon
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, Form of the Dragon deals 5 damage to target creature or player. At the beginning of each end step, your life total becomes 5. Creatures without flying can't attack you.

card.name: Frontline Strategist
card.property: Morph {W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.) When Frontline Strategist is turned face up, prevent all combat damage non-Soldier creatures would deal this turn.

card.name: Frozen Solid
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step. When enchanted creature is dealt damage, destroy it.

card.name: Gilded Light
card.property: You gain shroud until end of turn. (You can't be the target of spells or abilities.) Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Whoever survives the first blow lives to land the second."

card.name: Goblin Brigand
card.property: Goblin Brigand attacks each turn if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After the Skirk Ridge collapsed, the goblins erected a system of ropes and pulleys to hold up what was left.

card.name: Goblin Psychopath
card.property: Whenever Goblin Psychopath attacks or blocks, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, the next time it would deal combat damage this turn, it deals that damage to you instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The destruction he causes is nothing next to the chaos in his mind.

card.name: Goblin War Strike
card.property: Goblin War Strike deals damage to target player equal to the number of Goblins you control.

card.name: Goblin Warchief
card.property: Goblin spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. Goblin creatures you control have haste.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They poured from the Skirk Ridge like lava, burning and devouring everything in their path.

card.name: Grip of Chaos
card.property: Whenever a spell or ability is put onto the stack, if it has a single target, reselect its target at random. (Select from among all legal targets.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the world is consumed by chaos, the skilled and the foolish are on equal footing.

card.name: Guilty Conscience
card.property: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature deals damage, Guilty Conscience deals that much damage to that creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Those who most feel guilt don't need to, while those who most need to feel guilt never do.—Order proverb

card.name: Hindering Touch
card.property: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {2}. Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn. You may choose new targets for the copies.)

card.name: Hunting Pack
card.property: Create a 4/4 green Beast creature token. Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn.)

card.name: Karona's Zealot
card.property: Morph {3}{W}{W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.) When Karona's Zealot is turned face up, all damage that would be dealt to it this turn is dealt to target creature instead.

card.name: Karona, False God

property.name: Color
property.value: Multicolor White Blue Black Red Green

card.property: Haste At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player untaps Karona, False God and gains control of it. Whenever Karona attacks, creatures of the creature type of your choice get +3/+3 until end of turn.

card.name: Krosan Drover
card.property: Creature spells you cast with converted mana cost 6 or greater cost {2} less to cast.

card.name: Krosan Warchief
card.property: Beast spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. {1}{G}: Regenerate target Beast.

card.name: Kurgadon
card.property: Whenever you cast a creature spell with converted mana cost 6 or greater, put three +1/+1 counters on Kurgadon.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When it walks through Krosa, trees step aside, leaves take wing, and the ground shudders.

card.name: Lethal Vapors
card.property: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, destroy it. {0}: Destroy Lethal Vapors. You skip your next turn. Any player may activate this ability.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The vapors infiltrate every crevice, poison every lung, and snuff out every life.

card.name: Lingering Death
card.property: Enchant creature At the beginning of the end step of enchanted creature's controller, that player sacrifices that creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Looks bad. I don't know if he'll make it through the night."—Cabal cleric

card.name: Long-Term Plans
card.property: Search your library for a card, shuffle your library, then put that card third from the top.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Wait, it'll come to me in a minute."

card.name: Mercurial Kite
card.property: Flying Whenever Mercurial Kite deals combat damage to a creature, tap that creature. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

card.name: Metamorphose
card.property: Put target permanent an opponent controls on top of its owner's library. That opponent may put an artifact, creature, enchantment, or land card from his or her hand onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If it's not one thing, it's another.

card.name: Mind's Desire
card.property: Shuffle your library. Then exile the top card of your library. Until end of turn, you may play that card without paying its mana cost. (If it has X in its mana cost, X is 0.) Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn.)

card.name: Mischievous Quanar
Misguided Rage
card.property: Target player sacrifices a permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only when the anger passed did Varv realize he had burned down his home, destroyed his weapons, and killed his friend Furt.

card.name: Mistform Warchief
card.property: Creature spells you cast that share a creature type with Mistform Warchief cost {1} less to cast. {T}: Mistform Warchief becomes the creature type of your choice until end of turn.

card.name: Nefashu
card.property: Whenever Nefashu attacks, up to five target creatures each get -1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Where the nefashu pass, blood rolls like a silk carpet.

card.name: Parallel Thoughts
card.property: When Parallel Thoughts enters the battlefield, search your library for seven cards, exile them in a face-down pile, and shuffle that pile. Then shuffle your library. If you would draw a card, you may instead put the top card of the pile you exiled into your hand.

card.name: Pemmin's Aura
card.property: Enchant creature {U}: Untap enchanted creature. {U}: Enchanted creature gains flying until end of turn. {U}: Enchanted creature gains shroud until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.) {1}: Enchanted creature gets +1/-1 or -1/+1 until end of turn.

card.property: Reveal the first card you draw each turn. Whenever you reveal a creature card this way, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor

card.property: Morph—Return a Bird you control to its owner's hand. (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

property.name: Flavor

card.name: Reaping the Graves
card.property: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn. You may choose new targets for the copies.)

card.property: Choose one — • You gain 6 life. • Prevent the next 6 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn.

property.name: Flavor

card.name: Reward the Faithful

property.name: Flavor

card.name: Riptide Survivor

card.name: Rock Jockey
card.property: You can't cast Rock Jockey if you've played a land this turn. You can't play lands if you've cast Rock Jockey this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Goblins don't know much about physics, but they know lots about falling and rocks.

card.name: Root Elemental

card.property: Target player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life. Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn. You may choose new targets for the copies.)

card.name: Thundercloud Elemental
card.property: Flying {3}{U}: Tap all creatures with toughness 2 or less. {3}{U}: All other creatures lose flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some days it's better to stay inside.

card.name: Titanic Bulvox
card.property: Trample Morph {4}{G}{G}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: With natural laws abandoned, excess thrives.

card.name: Torrent of Fire
card.property: Torrent of Fire deals damage to target creature or player equal to the highest converted mana cost among permanents you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dragon fire melts any instrument designed to measure it.

card.name: Trap Digger
Treetop Scout
card.property: Treetop Scout can't be blocked except by creatures with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: At home among the swaying, supple branches of the treetops, some scouts live their entire lives never touching ground.

card.name: Twisted Abomination
card.property: {B}: Regenerate Twisted Abomination. Swampcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Swamp card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.)

card.name: Unburden
card.property: Target player discards two cards. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Cabal initiates enter training full of hopes and fears. They graduate with neither.

card.name: Uncontrolled Infestation
card.property: Enchant nonbasic land When enchanted land becomes tapped, destroy it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The grounds of the Riptide Project are now populated only by slivers, broken beakers, and the lonely screeching of gulls.

card.name: Undead Warchief
card.property: Zombie spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. Zombie creatures you control get +2/+1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It has the strength of seven men. In fact, it used to be seven men.

card.name: Unspeakable Symbol
card.property: Pay 3 life: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The symbols are spread throughout Aphetto, marking sites where minions of the Raven Guild and the Cabal can seek refuge.

card.name: Upwelling
card.property: Mana pools don't empty as steps and phases end.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Once again, Kamahl felt the full force of the Mirari's pull, but he had learned much since the last time.

card.name: Vengeful Dead
card.property: Whenever Vengeful Dead or another Zombie dies, each opponent loses 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Those who don't learn from their deaths are destined to repeat them.

card.name: Wing Shards
card.property: Target player sacrifices an attacking creature. Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn.)

card.name: Wipe Clean
card.property: Exile target enchantment. Cycling {3} ({3}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The light of the Ancestor will scour the taint of darkness from the land."

card.name: Wirewood Guardian
card.property: Forestcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Forest card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Tall as a tree and probably related.

card.name: Wirewood Symbiote
card.property: Return an Elf you control to its owner's hand: Untap target creature. Activate this ability only once each turn.

card.name: Woodcloaker
card.property: Morph {2}{G}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.) When Woodcloaker is turned face up, target creature gains trample until end of turn.

card.name: Xantid Swarm
card.property: Flying Whenever Xantid Swarm attacks, defending player can't cast spells this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When they land on you, all you can think about is tearing them off.

card.name: Zealous Inquisitor
card.property: {1} {W}: The next 1 damage that would be dealt to Zealous Inquisitor this turn is dealt to target creature instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I only return what rightly belongs to another."

card.name: Zombie Cutthroat
card.property: Morph—Pay 5 life. (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The single-mindedness of a zombie, the cunning of an assassin.
